scripts.start: set ELEVENTY_ENV=development&& npx gulp clean && eleventy --serve --watch
scripts.startDebug: set ELEVENTY_ENV=development&& set DEBUG=Eleventy*&& npx gulp clean && eleventy --serve --watch
scripts.buildDev: npx gulp clean && set ELEVENTY_ENV=development&& eleventy
scripts.deployLocal: del D:\inetpub\colormemoss\* /Q /S && (for /d %x in (D:\inetpub\colormemoss\*) do @rd /Q /S "%x") && xcopy .\www D:\inetpub\colormemoss /S
